text: Miss Polonia 2019 was the 42nd Miss Polonia pageant, held on November 24, 2019. The winner of Miss Polonia was Karolina Bielawska of Łódź and she will represent Poland in Miss World 2020. The 1st Runner-up, Aleksandra Kielan, will represent the country at Miss Charm 2020. The 2nd Runner-Up, Karina Nowak, will represent the country in Miss Grand International 2020. ==Final results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- ! Final results !
